content.text: Not much, I'm just hanging out. What about you?
I'm pretty good. I'm just getting ready to start a new business.
Oh cool! What kind of business?
I'm going to be starting a bakery. I've always loved baking, so I thought why not make it a career.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm a bit nervous, but mostly excited.
I know what you mean. Starting a new business is always a little scary, but it's also really exciting.
Yeah, I'm just hoping I can make it work.
I'm sure you will. You seem really passionate about it, and that's half the battle.
No problem! So what kind of cakes do you like to bake?
I like to bake all kinds of cakes, but my favorite is probably red velvet.
Red velvet is my favorite too! I love the cream cheese frosting.
So are you going to be selling your cakes online?
I'm not sure yet. I'm still working on that.
Well, let me know if you do. I'd love to try one of your cakes.
